name: flash-fire

effect.x-y: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

short_effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.x-y: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire- type moves if it’s hit by one.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
